definition: Automatically creating test cases, test fixtures, and test code for verifying program correctness

positive_examples: The AI generated unit tests covering the happy path and edge cases for the sorting function.
Test generation created property-based tests for the parser using hypothesis.
Automated test generation produced integration tests for the REST API endpoints.
The assistant generated test cases for boundary conditions including empty input and overflow.
training_hints.disambiguation: Automated creation of test code and cases, not manual test writing or execution
